an7.53:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ caranti mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ.
an7.53:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena veḷukaṇḍakī nandamātā upāsikā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya pārāyanaṃ sarena bhāsati.
an7.53:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchati kenacideva karaṇīyena.
an7.53:2.2: Assosi kho vessavaṇo mahārājā nandamātāya upāsikāya pārāyanaṃ sarena bhāsantiyā, sutvā kathāpariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
an7.53:3.1: Atha kho nandamātā upāsikā pārāyanaṃ sarena bhāsitvā tuṇhī ahosi.
an7.53:3.2: Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā nandamātāya upāsikāya kathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā abbhānumodi:
an7.53:3.6: “Sādhu, bhadramukha, tena hi yo me ayaṃ dhammapariyāyo bhaṇito idaṃ te hotu ātitheyyan”ti.
an7.53:3.8: Sveva sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho akatapātarāso veḷukaṇḍakaṃ āgamissati, tañca bhikkhusaṃghaṃ parivisitvā mama dakkhiṇaṃ ādiseyyāsi.
an7.53:4.1: Atha kho nandamātā upāsikā tassā rattiyā accayena sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpesi.
an7.53:4.2: Atha kho sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho akatapātarāso yena veḷukaṇḍako tadavasari.
an7.53:4.3: Atha kho nandamātā upāsikā aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
an7.53:4.4: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa kālaṃ ārocehi:
an7.53:4.5: ‘kālo, bhante, ayyāya nandamātuyā nivesane niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan’”ti.
an7.53:4.6: “Evaṃ, ayye”ti kho so puriso nandamātāya upāsikāya paṭissutvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa kālaṃ ārocesi:
an7.53:4.7: “kālo, bhante, ayyāya nandamātuyā nivesane niṭṭhitaṃ bhattan”ti.
an7.53:4.8: Atha kho sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṅgho pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena nandamātāya upāsikāya nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an7.53:4.9: Atha kho nandamātā upāsikā sāriputtamoggallānappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
an7.53:5.1: Atha kho nandamātā upāsikā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an7.53:5.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho nandamātaraṃ upāsikaṃ āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:
an7.53:5.3: “ko pana te, nandamāte, bhikkhusaṅghassa abbhāgamanaṃ ārocesī”ti?
an7.53:6.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya pārāyanaṃ sarena bhāsitvā tuṇhī ahosiṃ.
an7.53:6.2: Atha kho, bhante, vessavaṇo mahārājā mama kathāpariyosānaṃ viditvā abbhānumodi:
an7.53:6.6: ‘Sādhu, bhadramukha, tena hi yo me ayaṃ dhammapariyāyo bhaṇito idaṃ te hotu ātitheyyan’ti.
an7.53:6.8: Sveva sāriputtamoggallānappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho akatapātarāso veḷukaṇḍakaṃ āgamissati, tañca bhikkhusaṃghaṃ parivisitvā mama dakkhiṇaṃ ādiseyyāsi.
an7.53:6.10: Yadidaṃ, bhante, dāne puññañca puññamahī ca taṃ vessavaṇassa mahārājassa sukhāya hotū”ti.
an7.53:7.2: Yatra hi nāma vessavaṇena mahārājena evaṃmahiddhikena evaṃmahesakkhena devaputtena sammukhā sallapissasī”ti. (1)
an7.53:8.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:8.2: Atthi me aññopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:8.3: Idha me, bhante, nando nāma ekaputtako piyo manāpo.
an7.53:8.4: Taṃ rājāno kismiñcideva pakaraṇe okassa pasayha jīvitā voropesuṃ.
an7.53:8.5: Tasmiṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhante, dārake gahite vā gayhamāne vā vadhe vā vajjhamāne vā hate vā haññamāne vā nābhijānāmi cittassa aññathattan”ti.
an7.53:9.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:9.2: Atthi me aññopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:9.3: Idha me, bhante, sāmiko kālaṅkato aññataraṃ yakkhayoniṃ upapanno.
an7.53:9.4: So me teneva purimena attabhāvena uddassesi.
an7.53:9.5: Na kho panāhaṃ, bhante, abhijānāmi tatonidānaṃ cittassa aññathattan”ti.
an7.53:10.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:10.2: Atthi me aññopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:10.3: Yatohaṃ, bhante, sāmikassa daharasseva daharā ānītā nābhijānāmi sāmikaṃ manasāpi aticaritā, kuto pana kāyenā”ti.
an7.53:11.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:11.2: Atthi me aññopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:11.3: Yadāhaṃ, bhante, upāsikā paṭidesitā nābhijānāmi kiñci sikkhāpadaṃ sañcicca vītikkamitā”ti.
an7.53:12.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:12.2: Atthi me aññopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:12.3: Idhāhaṃ, bhante, yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
an7.53:12.4: Vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
an7.53:12.5: Pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhikā ca viharāmi satā ca sampajānā sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedemi, yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
an7.53:12.6: Sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmī”ti.
an7.53:13.1: “Na kho me, bhante, eseva acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:13.2: Atthi me aññopi acchariyo abbhuto dhammo.
an7.53:13.3: Yānimāni, bhante, bhagavatā desitāni pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni nāhaṃ tesaṃ kiñci attani appahīnaṃ samanupassāmī”ti.
an7.53:14.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto nandamātaraṃ upāsikaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
